SEARCH
Package ReceptionistSystem

Class NewPatientCreator

Object
NewPatientCreator
public class NewPatientCreator extends Object
The NewPatientCreator class provides functionality to create a new patient in the system. It gathers input from the user, validates the input, and adds the patient to the database. The class ensures unique identifiers and checks for duplicate entries before saving.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createNewPatient()
    Creates a new patient by prompting the receptionist for details such as name, date of birth, gender, phone number, email, and blood type.
    private String
    generatePatientId()
    Generates a unique patient ID in the format "P1XXX", where "XXX" is a zero-padded sequential number.

  • Method Details

    • createNewPatient

      public void createNewPatient() throws IOException
      Creates a new patient by prompting the receptionist for details such as name, date of birth, gender, phone number, email, and blood type. Validates input and ensures that no duplicate records are added.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error reading from or writing to the user database.

    • generatePatientId

      private String generatePatientId()
      Generates a unique patient ID in the format "P1XXX", where "XXX" is a zero-padded sequential number.
      Returns:
      a unique patient ID.
